history.proof: split. - intro H. qsimpl use: rev_involutive. qsimpl use: rev_involutive. hauto l: on depth: 3. - intro H. qsimpl use: rev_involutive.

exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type A, B : list X H : rev A = rev B The term "X" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "list ?A".
Found no subterm matching "rev A" in the current goal.
In environment H1 : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), rev (rev l) = l X : Type A, B : list X H : rev A = rev B Unable to unify "B" with "A".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment X : Type A, B : list X H : A = B The term "X" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "list ?A".

original: intros X B A. split. - intro H. rewrite <- (rev_involutive X A), <- (rev_involutive X B). rewrite H. reflexivity. - intro H. rewrite <- (rev_involutive X A), <- (rev_involutive X B). rewrite H. reflexivity.
